amendment.description: Amendment increases the Health Resources and Services Administrations (HRSA) Rural Health Programs by $1 million to prioritize ongoing coordination with the U.S. Department of Agricultures establishment of a Rural Health Liaison as directed by P.L. 115-334 (Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase by $1 million the Health Resources and Services Administrations (HRSA) Rural Health Programs to prioritize ongoing coordination with the U.S. Department of Agricultures establishment of a Rural Health Liaison as directed by P.L.115-334 (Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Craig amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 36 (Roll no. 308).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Craig amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 36 (Roll no. 308).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mrs. Craig.
